author: vivekjuneja
body: Currently the powershell link on osx refers to the linux.md link. I changed this link to osx anchor on the linux.md

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body: Hi **@vivekjuneja**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! title: Changed the link to Powershell on OSX
